##### Frontend

This branch contains applications frontend.

###### tests: 
![CI:frontend:tests](https://github.com/RedFoxFinn/rff-project/workflows/CI:frontend:tests/badge.svg?branch=frontend)

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/tests_with-cypress-lightgrey?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://www.cypress.io/)

###### frameworks & libraries:

- React.js
- React-router
- Redux.js
    - Redux-devtools -extension
    - Redux-thunk -middleware
    - Redux-saga -middleware ?
- Apollo-client -GraphQL-client
- Numbro (decimal formatting in calculate-app)
- Iconify icon library
- Cypress for e2e-testing
